titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2638) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-184, by Ms. Slaughter.
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 74.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 473.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 194 (Roll no. 451).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/12/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2638 (Department of Homeland Security Appropriations Act, 2008).
